about_the_game:
This DLC is playable in Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival game modes like Taiko Mode, Great Drum Toy War and Run! Ninja Dojo.

ONE PIECE Anime Songs Pack
- Song: We Are!
Easy ★3, Normal ★4, Hard ★5, Extreme ★6
- Song: OVER THE TOP
Easy ★1, Normal ★2, Hard ★2, Extreme ★6
- Song: One day
Easy ★2, Normal ★3, Hard ★5, Extreme ★6
- Song: KOKORO NO CHIZU
Easy ★3, Normal ★4, Hard ★4, Extreme ★5
- Song: BRAND NEW WORLD
Easy ★3, Normal ★5, Hard ★4, Extreme ★5

*The songs included in this product may also be available in the Taiko Music Pass.
